name: Ensure that AWS Organizations opt-out of AI services policy is enabled.
description: This control checks whether the AWS Organizations opt-out of AI services policy is enabled. The control fails if the policy is not enabled.

name: Check if AWS Regions are restricted with SCP policies
description: As best practice, AWS Regions should be restricted and only allow the ones that are needed.

name: Check if an AWS Organization has tags policies enabled and attached.
description: Check if an AWS Organization has tags policies enabled and attached.

name: Check if AWS Organizations delegated administrators are trusted
description: This check verify if there are AWS Organizations delegated administrators and if they are trusted (you can define your trusted delegated administrator in Prowler configuration)

name: Check if account is part of an AWS Organizations
description: Ensure that AWS Organizations service is currently in use.
